long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides useful calculators and references for Ingress, the augmented reality game by Niantic. Includes: portal calculator, attack simulator, link and recharge calculator, glyph dictionary, glyph hacking simulator, septicycle calendar, and reference section. Produced in association with Fev Games. Not officially affiliated with Ingress or Niantic Labs.
